actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption for vehicles primarily used for farming purposes from the requirements of section 280F of such Code (relating to limitation on certain property used for personal purposes).

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt agricultural vehicles from the rules relating to the limitation on the investment tax credit and depreciation deduction for certain property used for personal purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption for vehicles primarily used for farming purposes from the requirements of section 280F of such Code (relating to limitation on certain property used for personal purposes).
